short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Autofill a web form using data from a CSV file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily autofill student name and register numbers using data from a CSV file. Perfect for repetitive data entry tasks.

Full Description:

Dr RKC Autofill is a productivity tool designed to save you time and effort by automating the process of filling out web forms. Simply upload a CSV file with your data, and this extension will populate the corresponding fields on the webpage in seconds.

Key Features:

Supports forms with dynamic field IDs (e.g., roll_no_1, student_name_1, mark_det_1).
Quick and easy CSV upload directly from the extension popup.
Automatically matches CSV headers with form field IDs for seamless autofill.
Lightweight, fast, and simple to use.

Use Cases:

Lecturers entering student data into online forms.
Professionals handling repetitive form submissions.
Anyone who wants to reduce manual data entry errors and save time.

How to Use:

Open the webpage containing the form you want to fill out.
Click on the extension icon in your browser toolbar.
Upload your CSV file with headers matching the form field prefixes (e.g., roll_no, student_name, mark_det).
Click the "Autofill" button, and the form will be filled automatically.
Privacy:
Your data stays local and is never transmitted or stored.

Save time and eliminate errors with Dr RKC Autofill!
